Articles.Content:
Hello! I'd like to request an SSTO design similar to the second one that Vaos built in this video:

Requirements are:

  • Vertical Launch
  • Tiny/Minimalist/Low Part Count
  • Works with Farram Aerospace
  • Works with Deadly Reentry

Ideally it'll be a duplicate of Vaos's craft but works with FAR and DR. I can copy the design but it doesn't work properly with the two mods.

You can use KW and B9 for parts if you'd like as well.

Thank you in advance for any advice or help!
